ygData.subject: Re: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow man
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently lvl 22 and not particularly strong for my level and I have been hunting gargoyles.  I have died a few times, but mostly because I get greedy and
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently lvl 22 and not particularly strong for my level and I have
been hunting gargoyles. I have died a few times, but mostly because I get
greedy and think I can finish one off when I get low on hps. You can always
feign if you get in trouble. You should be able to solo them at lvl 22
(just make sure you are full of hp's and have a mend available). As far as
spawns, you have to kill the greater skels to get gargoyles to spawn. When
you leave try to leave one garg on the island since they do attack and kill
the skels, so the next person will come and have a few gargs already on
island.

You can get there by taking ship from freeport and get off at first stop. I
think it is called sister isle. Swim straight out from the dock until you
came to another island. Follow that island around to right a little way and
you will see another island in the distance. That is garg island. Hope this
helps.

Geraden 22nd circle from Ashen Order
Quellious.
----- Original Message -----
From: Jeff Bleich <dolph@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 12:44 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fellow
man


> From: "Jeff Bleich" <dolph@...>
>
>
> >Dornn, Level 17 Monk (Feign Death! Yeah, baby!), Brell Serilis, currently
> hunting Gargoyles in the Ocean of Tears.<
>
> Thank god you mentioned gargoyles. I'm level 22nd monk from cazic thule
and
> was wondering where I should hunt. I've hunted gorge hounds for the last
3
> levels and I do not want to hunt avaiks due to the over crowded
population.
> I'm fully decked out with serpentines/exe hoods/black pearl so i'm rather
> strong for my level. I guess what I'm asking is that What level are
> gargoyles and what island are they on? and do they respawn fast? any
trains?
> Can I solo?
>
> Does anyone recomend Cazic thule? I friend of mine said it took her 2
hours
> to find a group(24thmage) and died/zoned many of times.
>
> Another question. I have no boots. Leather is too heavy. They don't make
> mesh. Anyone know where i can get good boots with low wieght?
>
> Thanks for your time,
>
> Bismatal Bumrusher 22nd Circle
>
>
